mapper.sql:
FROM code a WHERE 1=1 AND delNY = #{delNY}
AND codeGroup_seq = #{shValue} AND nameKr LIKE CONTACT('%', #{shValue},'%') AND codeNameKr LIKE CONTACT('%', #{shValue},'%') AND codeName LIKE CONTACT('%', #{shValue},'%')
mapper.select: SELECT b.seq ,b.codeGroup_seq ,a.nameKr ,b.code ,b.codeAnother ,b.codeNameKr ,b.codeName ,b.useNY ,b.delNY ,b.order FROM codeGroup a left join code b on b.codeGroup_seq = a.seq WHERE 1=1 AND b.delNY = 0 AND nameKr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%')
